attributes.action: demand the EU President is elected through voting by EU citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think it is a disgrace and an insult to have an EU President who has not been elected by the citizens of the EU through democratic means.

We encourage the Prime Minister to deny any EU President not elected by popular vote and insist that only current elected MEP's may run for the position of EU President.

Many people are opposed to an EU President but if we must have one, they should be elected 'by the people for the people.'
